description:
They laugh at us behind closed doors lol.

What is the total compensation paid to innocent victims since the #VICP (Vaccine Injury Compensation Program) has existed?

Oh ya know... nothing major.  Just a mere $3.9 billion.

If vaccines are proven to be safe via double-blind placebo studies (in which NONE exist) then why would such a law need to be put in place???
.
SO many nurses and doctors are innocently & worst of all... unKNOWingly performing medical #malpractice nowadays, it's insanity.  All because they do what they're told like good little sheep and don't think for themselves 💉🤦‍♂️
.
#FollowTheMoney💸
#SayNoToBillGates
#Vaccines
